caption: This slow pop song features a female voice singing the main melody. The voice is tremulous and sings in a foreign language. This is accompanied by a string section playing chords and fills in harmony. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. There is no percussion in this song. The mood of this song is romantic and dreamy. This song can be played when there is a romantic flashback scene in a movie.
